info.name: Facepunch GDi Icon
info.description: This is no longer of use. GDi is gone. rip in feces gdi Adds an icon to General Disruption. This particular icon got 11 winners and is first shown by gk99 in GDi thread: http://facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=1283986&p=41266731&viewfull=1#post41266731 Thanks to isnipeu on Facepunch cause I'm a beginner at CSS and he helped me with shit. This code is very simple, just replaces the blank icon, that's all.
info.additionalInfo: When installed, make sure you click on Edit on the style, then on the bottom select URLs on the domain and to the right of it insert 'facepunch.com' without quotes, click add and save (to the upper left).
